titleStmt.title: SII 8.27: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 27. (A.R. No. 441 of 1902). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE SAME MANDAPA.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . rājarājadevaṟk=ku yāṇṭu 5vatu jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu ceyyūrāna jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻanallūr puṟṟiṭaṅ
koṇṭa mahādevark=ku Ivvūrt tiraiyan tevarkaṇṭaṉ tāṅkuvānāna Uttamacoḻavaḷavataraiyaṉ Iddevark=ku vaitta dharmmaṅkaḷ I
kkoyilil śivabrāhmaṇan sūriyan tāṅkuvāṉ puṟṟiṭaṅkoṇṭa mahāmuniyum ciyāṟudevabhaṭṭaṉ manavācakaṅkaṭantānum kaṭampan
tāṅkuvāṉbhaṭṭanum taḻuvak=kuḻaintāṉ celvabhaṭṭanum Iṉnālvom kaikkoṇṭu candrādityavarai celuttakkaṭavomāka sammati
ttuk kaikkoṇṭom Ikkoyilil tirumāḷikaip piḷḷaiyārk=ku Amāvāsipaṉniraṇṭum IṭaiUvāp paṉniraṇṭum viṣuvayana saṁkramam nālum
gra haṇamum Ivarkaḷ mātākkaḷ piṟanta Aippacippūramum Āṇṭoru catayamum Āṇṭu muppattiraṇṭu nāḷ piḷḷaiyārai Amutuceyvikkaik=ku maddhyāhna candi
Oṉṟuk=ku Arici nānāḻi Amutu ceyvittu Itile nāḷuri Ariciccoṟṟāl Apūrvvarkaḷ pūcittārk=ku Iṭakkaṭavomāka sammatittu kaikkoṇṭa kācu Iraṇṭu Āḷu
ṭaiyārk=ku maddhyānasaddhik=ku Aiñcu tirumañcaṉakkuṭam nāṅkaḷe koṇṭu tirumañcaṉa meṭuttu Abhiṣekam paṇṇa cammatittu kaikkoṇṭa kācu Oṉṟum dakṣiṇā
mūrttidevark=ku ciṟukālaisaddhi Oru tirumālai cārtta sammatittu kaikkoṇṭa kācu mukkāle Oru māvum Āḷuṭaiyārk=ku Oru sanḍiviḷak=ku Erikka
kkaṭavomāka sammatittu kaikkoṇṭa poṉ mukkāle mañcāṭiyum Iraṇṭumāvum Iddharmmaṅkaḷ nālum cantrādityaval celuttak=kaṭavomākak kaik
koṇṭu sa mmatittom paṉmāheśvara rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 8.27 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
